short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enlarges a selected text by clicking the UP icon or pressing <alt> + <space>

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted to highlight and enlarge some text? Just select the text and click the UP icon or press <alt> + <space>.
